# Desmos 3D Format - Boundary Surface Probe
# Copy and paste the lists below into Desmos 3D

# Boundary Points (x*)
# Paste these as three separate lists, then use (B_x, B_y, B_z) to plot

# Normal Vectors at Boundary Points
# These point toward the excluded zone
# To visualize: plot vectors from (B_x, B_y, B_z) to (B_x + s*N_x, B_y + s*N_y, B_z + s*N_z)
# where s is a scale factor (e.g., 0.1)
